methods.name: public Builder setIcon(@NonNull Bitmap value)
methods.comment: * The icon representing the app to be installed.

methods.name: public Builder setLabel(@NonNull CharSequence value)
methods.comment: * The label representing the app to be installed.

methods.name: public Builder setLocale(@NonNull ULocale value)
methods.comment:
* The locale is used to get the app label from the APKs (includes the base APK and
             * split APKs) related to the package to be installed. The caller needs to make sure
             * the app label is consistent with the app label of {@link PreapprovalDetails} when
             * validating the installation. Otherwise, the pre-approval install session will fail.

methods.name: public Builder setPackageName(@NonNull String value)
methods.comment: * The package name of the app to be installed.

methods.name: public PreapprovalDetails build()
methods.comment: Builds the instance. This builder should not be touched after calling this!
